pages.text: I have found a curious use for raw souls. It appears that forcing it to touch a planted sapling will make it merge with the young tree, creating a spectre sapling.$(br)These ethereal plants will absorb tiny amounts of soul energy from creatures in the soil it is planted on to feed itself, eventually growing into a tree that has transparent wood and leaves.
Additionally, it seems to trap souls in a similar way to the soulcatcher, and will occasionally drop (extremely weak) demon will, and rarely even a raw soul or two.
